column1: A funeral service will be 11:00 am Monday
column3: 2015 at the Gethsemane Missionary Baptist Church with Rev. W.J. McClendon officiating. Burial will follow in Lawnhaven Memorial Gardens. Arrangements are with Robert Massie Funeral Home. A visitation will be from 1:00 pm to 8:00 pm on Saturday
column5: 2015 at the Robert Massie Funeral Home.
